name: Dire Wolf

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolfs allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
